Add comprehensive transaction history with wallet address identification

This commit adds a complete transaction viewing system with automatic

Backend changes:
- Add /api/:network/transactions endpoint for fetching transaction history
- Add transaction types (TransactionInput, TransactionOutput, BlockbookTransaction)
- Support isOwn field from Blockbook API for address ownership

Frontend changes:
- Add TransactionList component with transaction type classification (sent/received/internal/external)
- Add TransactionDetailsModal with detailed input/output breakdown
- Highlight wallet-owned addresses with purple border and "Your Wallet" badge
- Show derivation path details (chain type, index, format) for known addresses
- Calculate real wallet impact: (my outputs - my inputs) instead of total transaction value
- Color-code amounts: green for received, red for sent

Address discovery:
- Add addressDiscovery.ts with automatic address pool expansion
- Analyze transaction history to find max used address index
- Auto-derive addresses up to (max_index + gap_limit) using BIP44 gap limit concept
- Support combined ownership detection: API isOwn field + local address map
- Add index field to DerivedAddress type for tracking address positions

Transaction classification logic:
- Internal: ALL inputs AND outputs belong to wallet
- Sent: wallet has inputs, but not all outputs are wallet''s
- Received: wallet has outputs, but no wallet inputs
- External: no wallet involvement

Display improvements:
- Show "Spent" amount for sent transactions (includes recipient + fee)
- Show "Received" amount for incoming transactions
- Show "Transferred" for internal moves
- Display wallet address count per transaction (X in / Y out)
- Add tooltips explaining transaction types
